title: Welcome !
body:
**Hello, World !**

This is my first post on this blog hosted at awesome [github pages][1]. Previously I used to blog on [sarfraznawaz.wordpress.com][2]. I really wanted to have static blog and ability to write up quick posts using Markdown syntax.

On this blog, I intend to write my ideas mainly about PHP as well as other related web development technologies.


  [1]: https://pages.github.com/
  [2]: http://sarfraznawaz.wordpress.com

title: Welcome !
body:
**Hello, World !**

This is my first post on this blog hosted at awesome [github pages][1]. Previously I used to blog on [sarfraznawaz.wordpress.com][2] but I switched to github pages because I really wanted to have static blog with free hosting and ability to write up quick posts using [Markdown][3] syntax. In the next post, I will write about **BloggerCMS**, a CMS I have made that helps create static blogs. This blog has also been generated via BloggerCMS :)

On this blog, I intend to write my ideas mainly about PHP as well as other related web development technologies. *Stayed tuned :)*


  [1]: https://pages.github.com/
  [2]: http://sarfraznawaz.wordpress.com
  [3]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown
